notes: Only the attack range bonus is limited to ranged attacks. Melee attacks only apply the damage.

The bonus damage is dealt in one instance together with the attack damage, and counts as attack damage as well. However, it is not considered by lifesteal, crit or cleave. It is also not affected by percentage-based attack damage bonuses or reductions, but can be reduced with flat reductions.
However, it is not considered by lifesteal, crit or cleave.
It is also not affected by percentage-based attack damage bonuses or reductions, but can be reduced with flat reductions.
Triggers against any attack target, but the damage and True Strike are not applied if the target is a building.
abilities.description: Empowers your next attack with 300 bonus magical damage and True Strike. Ranged Attackers have +400 bonus range for the attack.
params: Illusions do not apply the damage, but get the extra range and True Strike.

name: Enchanted Quiver
description: A graceful gift blessed by the goddess of the hunt.
